message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I think this is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your life. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you highlighting the value of the product, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable going right now. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of meeting you halfway and offering the product to you for $11,500. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your life. What do you think?
